titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Ways and Means in the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: Provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Ways and Means for the 115th Congress.
